testcase.name: jsonSchemaValidationExample

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. warning: the following keywords are unknown and will be ignored: [qt-uri-protocols] level: "warning" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/Windows%2011/eclipse-workspace/Workspace%202/UdemyRestAssured/target/classes/EchoGet.json#","pointer":"/definitions/Welcome2/properties/url"} domain: "syntax" ignored: ["qt-uri-protocols"] error: object instance has properties which are not allowed by the schema: ["content-type","x-api-key","x-mock-match-request-body"] level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/Windows%2011/eclipse-workspace/Workspace%202/UdemyRestAssured/target/classes/EchoGet.json#","pointer":"/definitions/Headers"} instance: {"pointer":"/headers"} domain: "validation" keyword: "additionalProperties" unwanted: ["content-type","x-api-key","x-mock-match-request-body"] warning: the following keywords are unknown and will be ignored: [qt-uri-protocols] level: "warning" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/Windows%2011/eclipse-workspace/Workspace%202/UdemyRestAssured/target/classes/EchoGet.json#","pointer":"/definitions/Welcome2/properties/url"} domain: "syntax" ignored: ["qt-uri-protocols"]
Actual: { "args": {}, "headers": { "x-forwarded-proto": "https", "x-forwarded-port": "443", "host": "postman-echo.com", "x-amzn-trace-id": "Root=1-65ddf8f2-5c82a2691992d53e59ca55e8", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "x-mock-match-request-body": "true", "accept": "*/*", "x-api-key": "PMAK-659d95664380a40bdd208044-da49c168ef3b7b6f9382a2e5c32f0d2eb2", "user-agent": "Apache-HttpClient/4.5.13 (Java/17.0.9)", "accept-encoding": "gzip,deflate" }, "url": "https://postman-echo.com/get" }
